title: What to do when someone calls your lane when you've already called it?
body:
I'm about to be banned for being in jungle, yet i called it first and waited for auto lock.

How can I get away from finding these degenerates who refuse to choose a different lane without getting banned?
Because if i leave the game, I get in trouble. Yet I'd be reported for being a jungler when there's another jungler there although I called it first.

Is there anything I can do?

I know I sound like I'm complaining, but when it happens to you almost every single game, and you show them that you called the lane before they joined and they tell you to KYS, or get f@#ked, or something about my family.. 
But I'm over it. What can I do? Besides uninstall and play a different game?

replies.body:
Learn to call 'Fill'. I just learnt a few champs in the two lanes I didn't main just so I could remove the hassle of calling lanes.

Or you could play the real version of LoL and play ranked, where you never have to fight for lanes. Once you've played ranked, you'll nary care about norms ever again...

Please dont suggest people who can only play one lane to play ranked.

its bad enough here as it is.

I'll agree with you on that one!
I'm not good enough for ranked yet lol

Atleast you recognise that,

The first step to getting better at league is to recognise when you are shit.

You cant learn if you think you know everything already.

cant say the same for other people.

Hahahaha.
I'm not shit, but I don't have enough experience yet. And not enough confidence to play ranked, cause I don't want to let others down.
